name: Pilgrimage (itch) (DB414)
description:
This game tells a story of regret and reconciliation. Everyone has experienced regrets, and these memories can be hidden by time, while the history it forms cannot be erased ......If you had the chance to look at your regrets directly again, would you choose to reconcile with yourself?

Control: Mouse

Team members: 

Producer: Stephen Zhou

Lead Designer & Sound Designer: Dexter Huang

Lead Artist: Yue Deng

Lead Programmer: Qiyao Xie
